element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithms extends a polygons layer with statistical values from a set of raster layers. For each polygons, values of cells inside them are analyzed, and basic statistical values are computed for each one of the selected raster layers

element.name: GRIDS
element.text: A set of raster layers to analyze

element.name: RESULT
element.text:
The output layer is identical to the input polygons layer, but contains new fields in its attributes table, corresponding to each of the input raster layers.
For each raster layer, the following fields are added: * mean * variance * minimum value * maximum value
